markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Confident Finisher](/Actions.aspx?ID=2818) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=802" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You make an incredibly graceful attack, piercing your foe’s defenses. Make a Strike with the following failure effect. 

**Failure** You deal half your precise strike damage to the target. This damage type is that of the weapon or unarmed attack you used for the Strike.
name: Confident Finisher
